news_header: South Korean actress Kim Sae-ron has been found dead at her home in Seoul at the age of 24. Police reported no signs of foul play and are investigating the cause of death.
news_original_title: South Korean actress Kim Sae-ron, 24, found dead
news_text: Kim was recognized as a promising young actress, gaining fame from her role in the 2009 film 'A Brand New Life' and starring in several successful films and dramas. She withdrew from the public eye in 2022 following a drink driving incident and her last role was in Netflix's 2023 drama 'Bloodhounds'.
